channel.title: Constantly getting this error in compiler
channel.description:
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Starting WarScape v2 Server on 0.0.0.0:43594
Now, i have the latest updates of the jdk and jre, but i cant get it to work.
Heres what i have inside the compiler
@echo off COLOR 08 title YOURSERVERNAME Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" server pause
help please?

item.description:
@Embrace_sin wrote:

Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
Starting WarScape v2 Server on 0.0.0.0:43594

Now, i have the latest updates of the jdk and jre, but i cant get it to work.

Heres what i have inside the compiler

@echo off
COLOR 08
title YOURSERVERNAME Client
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe” server
pause

help please?
